post.title: The problem is not race, it is culture
post.body:
When a baby is born, apart from any genetic inclinations and prenatal conditioning, it is pretty much a blank slate. Until it is steeped in a culture.

Let me tell you about bacteria. When taking a bacterial swab, you put it on a medium. The media is the food the various bacteria consume that will make them thrive or die off. Use one type of media and you get one type of culture. Use another type of media and you get another culture.

The media we consume determines our culture which determines our behaviour.

Comparing myself with someone from a muslim culture for example:

In my culture, we eat pork. 

That is not acceptable in your culture

In your culture, you treat women like subhumans, blow up and behead anyone disagreeing with you, wipe your ass with your hands, have a tone deaf guy shouting at the top of his lungs five times a day to call you together to do your OCD rituals to a violent demon god.

That is not acceptable in my culture.

So you see, we may have some problems cohabiting. Doesn't mean you are an evil human. No I pity you to have the misfortune to be born in such a toxic medium. 

But don't pull any of that shit here or we will cut you up!

post.title: On Japanese customs
post.body:
According to Japanese custom, a girl above 25 is considered unmarriable.

Women hit a peak in beauty at about 23, so for a man to get anything for his trouble, she should be much younger than that. 

After 25 he will just keep her around from old habit.

The Japanese know what they are talking about.
